overview: The film "Latvian Rocket" is a documentary about HGK team's journey to the final stage of Formula Drift in America giving us a peek of what hides behind startling achievements. That is a film about enthusiasm, passion, willpower and nerves of steel. Latvian film crew named Robyworks went to Formula Drift stage to document the whole process in action with real emotions at the spot - interviews under pressure short before the race and all the atmosphere inside and out the team.
title: Latvian Rocket
